item.title: By: Joseph Scott

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/11/18/bitcoin-atm/#comment-4114">julien51</a>.
I'll pass this request along to the folks who worked on that.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to julien51.

I’ll pass this request along to the folks who worked on that.

item.title: By: julien51
item.dc:creator: julien51
item.description:
I'd love if you guys shared more about the volume of transactions/amount in BTC for http://en.support.wordpress.com/bitcoin/
It'd be even more fascinating if you publish the (if you use only one) wallet info so we could track the number of transactions... etc.
item.content:encoded:
I’d love if you guys shared more about the volume of transactions/amount in BTC for http://en.support.wordpress.com/bitcoin/

It’d be even more fascinating if you publish the (if you use only one) wallet info so we could track the number of transactions… etc.
